类 SSLUtils

extends java.lang.Object
    Common utilities to manage SSL transport settings.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getSSLEnabled

        public static boolean getSSLEnabled(Configuration sslConfig)
        Retrieves the global ssl flag from configuration.
        参数:
        sslConfig - The application configuration
        返回:
        true if global ssl flag is set

      • setSSLVerAndCipherSuites

        public static void setSSLVerAndCipherSuites(java.net.ServerSocket socket,
                                            Configuration config)
        Sets SSl version and cipher suites for SSLServerSocket.
        参数:
        socket - Socket to be handled
        config - The application configuration

      • setSSLVerAndCipherSuites

        public static void setSSLVerAndCipherSuites(javax.net.ssl.SSLEngine engine,
                                            Configuration config)
        Sets SSL version and cipher suites for SSLEngine.
        参数:
        engine - SSLEngine to be handled
        config - The application configuration

      • setSSLVerifyHostname

        public static void setSSLVerifyHostname(Configuration sslConfig,
                                        javax.net.ssl.SSLParameters sslParams)
        Sets SSL options to verify peer's hostname in the certificate.
        参数:
        sslConfig - The application configuration
        sslParams - The SSL parameters that need to be updated

      • createSSLClientContext

        public static javax.net.ssl.SSLContext createSSLClientContext(Configuration sslConfig)
                                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates the SSL Context for the client if SSL is configured.
        参数:
        sslConfig - The application configuration
        返回:
        The SSLContext object which can be used by the ssl transport client Returns null if SSL is disabled
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown if there is any misconfiguration

      • createSSLServerContext

        public static javax.net.ssl.SSLContext createSSLServerContext(Configuration sslConfig)
                                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates the SSL Context for the server if SSL is configured.
        参数:
        sslConfig - The application configuration
        返回:
        The SSLContext object which can be used by the ssl transport server Returns null if SSL is disabled
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown if there is any misconfiguration
